name: resolveTransactionAmount(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the amount that the user wants to transfer.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveTransactionAmount(for intent: INTransferMoneyIntent, 
                                  with completion: @escaping (INPaymentAmountResolutionResult) -> Void)
